name: Dr. Rashel Anti-Aging Sunscreen
description: A high-protection sunscreen with SPF 60, designed to prevent premature aging and shield skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays. Lightweight and non-greasy, suitable for daily use.
ingredients: Zinc Oxide, Octinoxate, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Extract, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid
howToUse: Apply generously to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours.

name: Sepi White Strong Whitening Capsule Corrector
description: Intensive whitening corrector capsules that target dark spots and uneven skin tone. Contains advanced brightening agents for a radiant complexion.
ingredients: Niacinamide, Alpha-Arbutin, Vitamin C, Licorice Root Extract, Salicylic Acid
howToUse: Twist open capsule and apply serum to cleansed skin. Use nightly.

name: Golden Glow Lotion
description: An intensive half-cast lotion that enhances skin radiance and provides a natural golden tint. Hydrates while subtly bronzing the skin.
ingredients: Dihydroxyacetone (DHA), Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil
howToUse: Apply evenly to clean skin. Wash hands after use. Reapply for deeper color.

name: Feique 2-in-1 Herbal Extract Cream
description: A multitasking herbal cream that combines moisturizing and soothing properties. Infused with natural extracts to nourish and protect the skin.
ingredients: Chamomile Extract, Calendula, Aloe Vera, Olive Oil, Beeswax
howToUse: Apply to face and body as needed. Ideal for daytime use.

name: Ghost Bond Invisible Bonding Glue
description: Professional-grade adhesive for securing wigs, lace fronts, and hairpieces. Dries clear and provides a strong, long-lasting hold.
ingredients: Acrylic Polymer, Ethyl Acetate, Isopropyl Alcohol
howToUse: Apply thin layer to clean scalp or hairpiece. Press firmly for 30 seconds.

name: Huile White Now Triple Action Oil
description: A triple-action oil that brightens, moisturizes, and evens skin tone. Lightweight and fast-absorbing for all-day hydration.
ingredients: Rosehip Oil, Almond Oil, Vitamin E, Licorice Extract
howToUse: Massage into skin daily, focusing on dark areas.

name: Collagen Anti-Aging Serum
description: A potent serum with collagen and hyaluronic acid to reduce wrinkles, hydrate, and brighten skin. Targets fine lines and loss of elasticity.
ingredients: Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, Green Tea Extract
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to cleansed face before moisturizer.

name: Hobby Shower Gel
description: A refreshing shower gel with an invigorating scent that leaves skin clean and lightly fragranced. Formulated to maintain skin's natural moisture balance while providing a luxurious lather.
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, DMDM Hydantoin, CI 19140, CI 42090.
howToUse: Apply to wet skin, lather, and rinse thoroughly. Ideal for daily use.

name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
description: A 7% glycolic acid exfoliating toner that helps improve skin texture, reduce dark spots, and brighten complexion. Particularly effective for addressing dark underarms and uneven skin tone.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycolic Acid, Aminomethyl Propanol, Glycerin, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Ginseng Root Extract, Panthenol.
howToUse: Apply to clean skin with cotton pad after cleansing. Use in evening routine. Follow with sunscreen during day.

name: Kojie San Soap
description: A classic skin lightening soap with kojic acid that helps reduce hyperpigmentation and even out skin tone. Gentle enough for daily use on face and body.
ingredients: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Kojic Acid, Fragrance, Titanium Dioxide.
howToUse: Lather soap between hands, apply to wet skin, leave for 1-2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Dr. Rashel Vitamin C Brightening & Anti-Aging Face Serum
description: A potent vitamin C serum that brightens skin, reduces signs of aging, and protects against environmental damage. Formulated with stable vitamin C derivatives for maximum efficacy.
ingredients: Aqua, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Panthenol, Allantoin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to cleansed face before moisturizer. Use in morning routine.

name: QBD Skincare Vitamin C Serum
description: An advanced vitamin C serum that delivers brightening and anti-aging benefits. Formulated to improve skin radiance and reduce the appearance of fine lines.
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera Extract, Panthenol.
howToUse: Apply to clean, dry skin morning and night. Follow with moisturizer.

name: Collagen Deep Cleansing Snail Face Serum
description: A multi-action serum with snail mucin and collagen that cleanses, brightens, and fights acne while providing anti-aging benefits. Suitable for all skin types.
ingredients: Snail Secretion Filtrate, Collagen, Niacinamide, Salicylic Acid, Tea Tree Oil, Aloe Vera Extract, Hyaluronic Acid.
howToUse: Apply after cleansing, leave for 5 minutes, then rinse or leave overnight for intensive treatment.

name: Fruit of Wokali Professional Care Vitamin C Serum
description: A professional-grade serum with 99% vitamin C and hyaluronic acid that targets aging signs, freckles, and uneven skin tone for a radiant complexion.
ingredients: Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera Juice, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol.
howToUse: Apply 3-4 drops to face and neck after cleansing. Use sunscreen during day.

name: Medix 5.5 Vitamin C & Turmeric Lotion
description: A nourishing body lotion combining vitamin C and turmeric to brighten skin, even tone, and provide antioxidant protection. pH balanced at 5.5 for skin-friendly application.
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Niacinamide, Shea Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate.
howToUse: Apply generously to clean skin after showering. Massage until fully absorbed.

name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Daily Skin Therapy Lotion
description: A deeply moisturizing body lotion with pure cocoa butter and vitamin E to improve skin elasticity and hydration. Clinically proven to reduce stretch marks and improve skin texture.
ingredients: Water, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glycerin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Sorbitan Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate.
howToUse: Apply liberally to body as needed, focusing on dry areas. Massage until fully absorbed.

name: Roushun Kojic Sugar Scrub
description: An exfoliating sugar scrub with kojic acid that gently removes dead skin cells while brightening and evening skin tone. Leaves skin smooth and refreshed.
ingredients: Sucrose, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Kojic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate.
howToUse: Gently massage onto damp skin in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use 2-3 times weekly.

name: Dr. Meinaier Kojic Acid Sugar Scrub
description: A professional-grade exfoliating scrub with kojic acid and natural sugars that brightens skin while removing impurities and dead skin cells.
ingredients: Sucrose, Kojic Acid, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Tocopherol.
howToUse: Apply to wet skin, massage gently for 1-2 minutes, then rinse. Avoid use on broken skin.

name: Dr. Rashel Vitamin C Brightening & Anti-Aging Face Cream
description: A nourishing face cream with stabilized vitamin C that brightens skin, reduces fine lines, and provides 24-hour hydration. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.
ingredients: Aqua, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide.
howToUse: Apply to cleansed face and neck every morning. Can be used under makeup.

name: Cantu Shea Butter Flexible Hold Strengthening Styling Gel
description: A maximum hold styling gel enriched with shea butter and Jamaican black castor oil that provides flexible hold while strengthening hair. Defines curls without flaking or crunchiness.
features: With shea butter and Jamaican black castor oil
ingredients: Water, VP/VA Copolymer, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Panthenol, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol.
howToUse: Apply to damp or dry hair. Style as desired. Can be used for twist-outs, braid-outs, and wash-n-go styles.

name: Cantu for Kids Styling Custard
description: A gentle styling custard specially formulated for children's delicate hair. Provides light hold while moisturizing curls, coils, and waves. Tear-free formula.
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol.
howToUse: Apply to damp hair and style as desired. Perfect for twist-outs, braids, and ponytails.

name: Cantu Shea Butter Sulphate-Free Cleansing Cream Shampoo
description: A moisturizing sulfate-free shampoo that gently cleanses natural hair without stripping moisture. Formulated for curls, coils, and waves with shea butter for added hydration.
ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol.
howToUse: Wet hair, apply shampoo, massage into scalp and through hair. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with conditioner.

name: Cantu Care for Kids Tear-Free Nourishing Shampoo
description: A gentle, tear-free shampoo specially formulated for children's hair and scalp. Nourishes while cleansing, leaving hair soft and manageable. Safe for regular use.
ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol.
howToUse: Wet hair, apply shampoo, gently massage into scalp and hair. Rinse thoroughly.
